mapper.insert: insert into sa_docnode (sid, sparentid, sdocname, ssequence, ssize, skind, sdocpath, sdocdisplaypath, screatorfid, screatorname, screatordeptname, screatetime, seditorfid, seditorname, seditordeptname, slastwriterfid, slastwritername, slastwriterdeptname, slastwritetime, sfileid, sdescription, sdocliveversionid, sclassification, skeywords, sdocserialnumber, snamespace, scachename, srevisioncachename, sflag, version ) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sparentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdocname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssequence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{skind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdocpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdocdisplaypath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{screatorfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{screatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{screatordeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{screatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{seditorfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seditorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seditordeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slastwriterfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slastwritername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slastwriterdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slastwritetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sfileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdocliveversionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sclassification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdocserialnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snamespace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scachename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srevisioncachename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update sa_docnode set sparentid = #{sparentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sdocname = #{sdocname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ssequence = #{ssequence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ssize = #{ssize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, skind = #{skind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sdocpath = #{sdocpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sdocdisplaypath = #{sdocdisplaypath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screatorfid = #{screatorfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screatorname = #{screatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screatordeptname = #{screatordeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screatetime = #{screatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, seditorfid = #{seditorfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seditorname = #{seditorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seditordeptname = #{seditordeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slastwriterfid = #{slastwriterfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slastwritername = #{slastwritername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slastwriterdeptname = #{slastwriterdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slastwritetime = #{slastwritetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sfileid = #{sfileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sdescription = #{sdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sdocliveversionid = #{sdocliveversionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sclassification = #{sclassification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skeywords = #{skeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sdocserialnumber = #{sdocserialnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, snamespace = #{snamespace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scachename = #{scachename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, srevisioncachename = #{srevisioncachename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sflag = #{sflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sid, sparentid, sdocname, ssequence, ssize, skind, sdocpath, sdocdisplaypath, screatorfid, screatorname, screatordeptname, screatetime, seditorfid, seditorname, seditordeptname, slastwriterfid, slastwritername, slastwriterdeptname, slastwritetime, sfileid, sdescription, sdocliveversionid, sclassification, skeywords, sdocserialnumber, snamespace, scachename, srevisioncachename, sflag, version from sa_docnode where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sid, sparentid, sdocname, ssequence, ssize, skind, sdocpath, sdocdisplaypath, screatorfid, screatorname, screatordeptname, screatetime, seditorfid, seditorname, seditordeptname, slastwriterfid, slastwritername, slastwriterdeptname, slastwritetime, sfileid, sdescription, sdocliveversionid, sclassification, skeywords, sdocserialnumber, snamespace, scachename, srevisioncachename, sflag, version from sa_docnode

select sid, sparentid, sdocname, ssequence, ssize, skind, sdocpath, sdocdisplaypath, screatorfid, screatorname, screatordeptname, screatetime, seditorfid, seditorname, seditordeptname, slastwriterfid, slastwritername, slastwriterdeptname, slastwritetime, sfileid, sdescription, sdocliveversionid, sclassification, skeywords, sdocserialnumber, snamespace, scachename, srevisioncachename, sflag, version from sa_docnode where sdocpath = #{docpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or sdocdisplaypath = #{docpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
